availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen A. Hunter (Madison County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, carpenter. Madison County, Kentucky native. Son of William Hunter and Jenny Hunter. Resident of Madison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Wool carder in Madison County in 1860. Carpenter in Madison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 2, p. 246A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 356.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Madison County, KY, June/July 1863, p. 150.
"Allen A. Hunter (1838-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial 30051433, accessed July 31, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/30051433.
